scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:performance && npm run test:fuzz
scripts.test:smoke: node --experimental-modules -e "import Magnus132Hermetic from './magnus-13-2-main.js'; const m = new Magnus132Hermetic(); await m.initialize(); console.log('Smoke test passed')"
scripts.test:regression: npm run test:all && npm run test:load
scripts.ci: npm run test:regression && npm run mutate
scripts.deploy:staging: echo 'Deploying to staging...' && kubectl apply -f k8s/staging/
scripts.deploy:production: echo 'Deploying to production...' && kubectl apply -f k8s/production/
scripts.rollback: echo 'Rolling back...' && kubectl rollout undo deployment/magnus-production
scripts.canary:check: echo 'Running canary checks...' && npm run health:check
